Review Date: 2019/11/30
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jon Eastman', 'Alex Freeman', 'Tim Usborne'], 'Producers': ['DCD Rights'], 'Starring': ['Jim Al-Khalili'], 'Studio': ['DCD Rights']}
Review Text: I love watching documentaries with this host.  The combination of his knowledge base & super effective educational style with the simple experiments & the show's special effects get to the finish line of tough but important scientific concepts. He's not patronizing or condescending to the audience. It leaves one feeling a bit more educated, empowered, and thoroughly entertained.
Review Title: Fun & insightful
Rating: 5.0
